doc.title: Our new Facebook Group and Twitter
doc.text: Currently/WP we/PRP have/VBP an/DT active/NN group/NN of/IN kakis/NNS who/WP meet/VBZ to/TO discuss/VB about/IN food/NN in/IN our/PRP$ forum/NN ./. But/CC I/PRP realize/VB that/WDT not/RB everyone/JJ likes/NN to/TO use/VB the/DT forum/NN and/CC it/PRP has/VBZ its/PRP$ limitation/NN in/IN terms/NN of/IN being/VBG able/JJ to/TO alert/VB readers/NNS to/TO the/DT upcoming/JJ makan/NN outings/NN ./.
